metadata.title: CVE-2021-36093 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: It's possible to create an email which can be stuck while being processed by PostMaster filters, causing DoS. This issue affects: OTRS AG ((OTRS)) Community Edition 6.0.x version 6.0.1 and later versions. OTRS AG OTRS 7.0.x version 7.0.28 and prior versions; 8.0.x version 8.0.15 and prior versions.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
